name: Witchy Wizard Magic Match-3
description:
Experience the world of MAGIC! Explore the magical land of Witchy Wizard - loved by millions of players around the world! Get ready for a match 3 swapping puzzle thrill. With unique board designs and an ever-changing array of strategic objectives, this puzzler puts a colorfully creative spin on classic match-three gameplay. It’s a perfect way to casually spend a spare few minutes, dedicated players will find themselves strategically swapping and mapping out moves as they strive for high score domination.

Touch and swipe to move into rows of 3 to clear them. Use power boosters to clear more from the boards. Tons of levels and fun in this awesome match 3 brain trainer! Challenges, tournaments, daily free prizes, and plenty of other events allow you to play this one free forever!!!

The magic comes alive with its awesome match 3 gameplay!

Game Features:
● New and improved gameplay
● Enchanting graphics that will leave you spellbound
● Fun weekend challenges to earn special prizes and rewards
● Saga based map with over 1000+ magical levels – more coming soon!
● Numerous boosters along the way to help you succeed
● Spectacular rewards and extra bonuses unlocked after levels passed
● Leaderboards to compete with your friends and competitors!
● New levels and maps added every 2 weeks!
● Special boosters & power-ups to help you pass those tricky levels
● Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
● Available to play on iPhone and iPad devices

Play this epic journey alone or with friends to see who can get the highest score!

The best and addictive match 3 puzzle game!

It's endless fun for all ages!

Download Witchy Wizard Mania for Free today!

https://www.facebook.com/Witchy-Wizard-Mania-233905510442556/

This game is completely free to play but some optional in-game items can be purchased with real money. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.
